news_header: Trump and Meloni spoke at a controversial conference, facing criticism for their ties to far-right ideologies.
news_original_title: Bannonin natsitervehdys ei estänyt Melonia osallistumasta USA:n oikeiston konferenssiin
news_text: Mr. Trump and Italian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni addressed the Conservative Political Action Conference, despite backlash from opposition figures. Meloni's attendance drew criticism, particularly from the Italian Democratic Party's Schlein, who condemned the neo-fascist elements associated with the event. Meloni, linked to far-right ideologies, was the only EU leader at Trump's inauguration last month and has avoided criticizing him, even while supporting Ukraine against Russia.
